issue.title: [CF 296] lua error of select reactive icon
issue.body:
DeathKnight don't have this error.

1x TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-4.5.6.lua:1690: attempt to index field "IgnoreRunes" (a nil value)
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-4.5.6.lua:1690: in function <TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:1686>
(tail call): ?
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-4.5.6.lua:1902: in function <TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:1897>
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-4.5.6.lua:1976: in function "LoadSettings"
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-4.5.6.lua:2265: in function "func"
FrameXML\UIDropDownMenu.lua:700: in function "UIDropDownMenuButton_OnClick"
<string>:"*:OnClick":1: in function <string>:"*:OnClick":1

Locals:
(*temporary) = "LeftButton"
(*temporary) = false
(*temporary) = <func> =[C]:-1


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #296 | Raw
